title: Introducing: mono mono
content:
Danish pop music is in a pretty great place right now, what with MØ conquering the charts and indie darlings Liss winning numerous tastemaker fans.

On their debut track, CityLights, Electro-pop duo mono mono (Karoline Elsig and Jakob Franck) showcase more than enough potential to suggest that they could be the next act from Denmark to hit the big time. Uber-cool, almost ANOHNI-esque at points – CityLights is gloriously romantic and intoxicatingly addictive. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
